Sentencas: As an important energy source, liquid diesel can be reformed in order to be used in high temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) cleanly and efficiently.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: However, a big challenge of using carbon containing fuels, such as diesel reformat, is carbon deposition on the porous Nil YSZ-anode structure caused by internal reforming reactions.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: In this work a planar industrial-sized 100 x 100 mm(2) anode supported SOFC fueled with synthetic diesel reformat was numerically and experimentally investigated, in order to predict carbon depositions in the porous anode substrate.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: Gas phase as well as detailed wall-surface reactions were scrutinized in order to evaluate reforming mechanisms available in literature.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: Implementation and simulation was done by one single 3D CFD simulation tool, since such a comparison is missing in the scientific community.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: It was shown that global reforming mechanisms are capable of correctly predicting the occurring gas phase reactions, but only provide indicators for the thermodynamic equilibria of considered carbon formation pathways.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: Detailed information about surface adsorbed carbon can only be determined by a heterogeneous reaction mechanism.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: Elementary carbon was shown to be permanently adsorbed onto the catalytic active sites in the anode by the conducted steady state simulations.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: The investigations showed that the inlet region of the porous anodic structure is especially susceptible to coking.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: Simulation results were validated with in-house experimentally determined data.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis

Sentencas: High cell current densities were reached during the single cell experiments, which determine good electrical contacting as well as electrochemical performance and therefore represent reliable validation data.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical and experimental investigation of an industrial-sized SOFC fueled by diesel reformat - Part II: Detailed reforming chemistry and carbon deposition analysis
